description: This is an Angular component class 'NotesListComponent' which manages the display and interaction of a notes list in a frontend application. It handles searching, navigation, and accessibility features for a notes listing interface.

classes.name: NotesListComponent
classes.description: An Angular component that displays a list of notes, supports search with debounce, highlights the active note based on URL, and allows navigation to notes or creating new notes.

methods.name: ngOnInit
methods.description: Initializes component, subscribes to route changes, sets up filtering notes stream based on search query.

methods.name: onQueryChange
methods.description: Updates the search query and debounced filter.

methods.name: onInput
methods.description: Handles input event, extracts string value, and calls onQueryChange.

methods.name: onSearchKeydown
methods.description: Handles keydown events to support keyboard navigation.

methods.name: openNote
methods.description: Navigates to the route corresponding to a specific note's ID.

methods.name: createNote
methods.description: Navigates to create a new note.

methods.name: isActive
methods.description: Checks if a given note is the currently active note based on URL.

methods.name: snippet
methods.description: Returns a truncated preview of the note content.

methods.name: tags
methods.description: Joins tags array into comma-separated string for display.

methods.name: onItemKeydown
methods.description: Handles keyboard navigation within note items, including ArrowUp, ArrowDown, Home, End, Enter, and Space.

methods.name: focusItem
methods.description: Moves focus to a list item DOM element at a specified index.

ctags.name: NotesListComponent
ctags.pattern: /^export class NotesListComponent implements OnInit {$/

ctags.name: clamp
ctags.pattern: /^    const clamp = (i: number) => Math.max(0, Math.min(notes.length - 1, i));$/

ctags.name: el
ctags.pattern: /^    const el = items && items[index] ? items[index] : null;$/

ctags.name: first
ctags.pattern: /^        const first = g.document.querySelector('.notes-ul .note-item') as any;$/

ctags.name: g
ctags.pattern: /^      const g: any = typeof globalThis !== 'undefined' ? globalThis : undefined;$/

ctags.name: g
ctags.pattern: /^    const g: any = typeof globalThis !== 'undefined' ? globalThis : undefined;$/

ctags.name: hasTarget
ctags.pattern: /^    const hasTarget = (e: unknown): e is { target: { value?: unknown } | null } =>$/

ctags.name: id
ctags.pattern: /^    const id = match && match[1] !== 'new' ? match[1] : null;$/

ctags.name: index
ctags.pattern: /^    const el = items && items[index] ? items[index] : null;$/

ctags.name: items
ctags.pattern: /^    const el = items && items[index] ? items[index] : null;$/

ctags.name: items
ctags.pattern: /^    const items = g.document.querySelectorAll('.notes-ul .note-item') as any;$/

ctags.name: key
ctags.pattern: /^    const key = event.key;$/

ctags.name: list
ctags.pattern: /^        const list = this.notesService.listNotes(q);$/

ctags.name: match
ctags.pattern: /^    const match = url.match(\/\\\/notes\\\/([^\\\/\\?]+)\/);$/

ctags.name: nextIndex
ctags.pattern: /^    let nextIndex = index;$/

ctags.name: notesService
ctags.pattern: /^  private readonly notesService = inject(NotesService);$/

ctags.name: target
ctags.pattern: /^    const target = hasTarget(event) ? (event as { target: { value?: unknown } | null }).target :/

ctags.name: target
ctags.pattern: /^    const val = target && typeof target.value === 'string' ? target.value : '';$/

ctags.name: text
ctags.pattern: /^    const text = (note.content ?? '').trim();$/

ctags.name: val
ctags.pattern: /^    const val = target && typeof target.value === 'string' ? target.value : '';$/
